    • Method Detail

      • getFilesList

        public static List<File> getFilesList(File sourceFolder,
                                      String[] extensions,
                                      boolean includeSubFolders)
        This method provides the list of files in the sourcePath, supports for passing required extensions to be searched
        Parameters:
        sourceFolder - Source Folder to traverse for files.
        extensions - List of extensions to be considered while reading the list of Files from Source Folder, If all files are required then set as null.
        includeSubFolders - Should Include Sub Folders (true/false)
        Returns:
        List of Files

      • getFilesList

                                      boolean includeSubFolders)

        Parameters:
        sourceFolderPath - Source Folder to traverse for files.
        extensions - List of extensions to be considered while reading the list of Files from Source Folder, If all files are required then set as null.
        includeSubFolders - Should Include Sub Folders (true/false)
        Returns:
        List of Files

      • getDirectories

        public static List<File> getDirectories(String parentFolderPath,
                                        boolean includeSubFolders)
        List all the directories in the Parent Folder.
        Parameters:
        parentFolderPath - Parent Folder searching for sub directories.
        includeSubFolders - include sub directories recursively inside sub directories.
        Returns:
        List of all Directories

      • getDirectories

                                        boolean includeSubFolders)

      • getDirectoriesWithName

        public static List<File> getDirectoriesWithName(String parentFolderPath,
                                                String folderNameMatchStr,
                                                int placeHolderValue)
        List all the directories in the Parent Folder matching the Name at the place Holder.
        Parameters:
        parentFolderPath - Parent Folder Path searching for sub directories.
        folderNameMatchStr - Match the Folder Name with sub String
        placeHolderValue - Place Holder values: Starting = 1, Middle/Contains = 2, Ending = 3, Not Starting = -1, Not Middle/Contains = -2, Not Ending = -3. Please pass respective values, If other value is passed this will return all folders.
        Returns:
        List of all Directories

      • getDirectoriesWithName

        public static List<File> getDirectoriesWithName(File parentFolder,
                                                String folderNameMatchStr,
                                                int placeHolderValue)
        List all the directories in the Parent Folder matching the Name at the place Holder.
        Parameters:
        parentFolder - Parent Folder Path searching for sub directories.
        folderNameMatchStr - Match the Folder Name with sub String
        placeHolderValue - Place Holder values: Starting = 1, Middle/Contains = 2, Ending = 3, Not Starting = -1, Not Middle/Contains = -2, Not Ending = -3. Please pass respective values, If other value is passed this will return all folders.
        Returns:
        List of all Directories

      • getDirectoriesWithName

        public static List<File> getDirectoriesWithName(String parentFolderPath,
                                                String folderNameMatchStr,
                                                int placeHolderValue,
                                                boolean includeSubFolders)
        List all the directories in the Parent Folder matching the Name at the place Holder.
        Parameters:
        parentFolderPath - Parent Folder Path searching for sub directories.
        folderNameMatchStr - Match the Folder Name with sub String
        placeHolderValue - Place Holder values: Starting = 1, Middle/Contains = 2, Ending = 3, Not Starting = -1, Not Middle/Contains = -2, Not Ending = -3. Please pass respective values, If other value is passed this will return all folders.
        includeSubFolders - include sub directories recursively inside sub directories.
        Returns:
        List of all Directories

      • deleteFileOrDirectory

        public static int deleteFileOrDirectory(File file)
        Delete the file or Directory/Folder
        Parameters:
        file - File/Directory to be deleted.
        Returns:
        int 1 = Directory/Sub Directories is Deleted Successfully
        2 = File is deleted Successfully
        3 = File/Directory is null or empty, No operation is performed.
